name: saga-logger
description: A basic Logger object that force a logging format, can use logentries

scripts.build: sbt loggerJS/fullOptJS; echo "var __ScalaJSEnv = { exportsNamespace: exports };" > dist/logger-opt.js; sed 's/global:this;/global:this;g.require=require;/' js/target/scala-2.11/logger-opt.js >> dist/logger-opt.js; babel --presets=es2015 --ignore='node_modules' src -d dist
scripts.2npm: cp package.json dist; npm publish dist

author: Louis Borsu <louis@sagacify.com>
